name: Hoarded In
description:
You've recently got a new apartment! It's so cheap that you are practically spending nothing on it. As a freelance writer, you're making little money at moment so this apartment is a godsend to you. But you feel strange, depressed, and almost like a broken record going over the same routine over and over. Worst of all you feel your home changing as if it's living.

This game was made for the Cosmic Horror Jam.
